summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General transcription request form for audio interviews related to case number 2019010614. It lists three interview recordings from September 22, 2021, including one with Mark Epstein, and was approved by supervisor Ryan Geach.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mark Epstein is listed as the subject of the third audio interview recording on September 22, 2021, with a duration of 1 hour, 11 minutes, and 44 seconds.

persons.name: Ryan Geach
persons.context: Ryan Geach digitally signed and approved the transcription request form on September 27, 2021.

events.title: Audio interview with Mark Epstein
events.description: An audio interview was conducted with Mark Epstein, with a recording length of 1 hour, 11 minutes, and 44 seconds.

events.title: Additional audio interviews
events.description: Two other audio interviews were conducted on the same date, with recording lengths of 1 hour, 42 minutes, 6 seconds and 53 minutes, 10 seconds, though the subjects are not named in the provided text.

keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for case number 2019010614, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, was interviewed in an audio recording on September 22, 2021.
The form was approved by supervisor Ryan Geach on September 27, 2021, for transcription with a 10-business-day turnaround.
